function getRandomInteger(min,max){return Math.floor(Math.random()*(max-min+1))+min;}export function fetchFromRemote(setIsLoading){var pxSize=getRandomInteger(1,10)*100;return new Promise(function(resolve){setIsLoading(true);// This inserts a 2 second delay so we can easily see a spinner at work
setTimeout(resolve,2000);}).then(function(){return fetch("https://placekitten.com/".concat(pxSize,"/").concat(pxSize));}).catch(function(){setIsLoading(false);return Promise.reject("Error fetching from placekitten.com");}).then(function(response){return response.blob();}).then(function(blob){setIsLoading(false);return URL.createObjectURL(blob);});}
